title: 806 24 "The Power of Satiety! A New Gear Four Form – Tank Man!"Transliteration: "Manpuku no Chikara – Shin Gia Fōsu Tankuman" (Japanese:満腹の力 新ギア４タンクマン！) Directed by: Miho HirayamaStoryboarded by: Aya Komaki Hitoshi Tanaka September 24, 2017(2017-09-24)
transformers_text: 806 24 The Power of Satiety A New Gear Four Form Tank Man Transliteration Man pu ku no Chikara Shin Gia F su Tank u man Japanese Directed by Mi ho Hirayama Story boarded by Aya Ko maki Hitoshi Tanaka September 24 2017 2017 09 24 Luffy is full from eating all of Cracker's biscuits for several hours but refuses to give up causing an enraged Cracker to attack him directly However Luffy activates another form of Gear Fourth known as Tank man Full Version Cracker is unable to penetrate Luffy and instead is sucked into his inflated body which shoots him out at high velocity flying all the way into Sweet City His unconscious body is discovered by his siblings who put Sweet City into a state of emergency Despite Luffy's victory Pound and King Baum warn him that Big Mom will retaliate with even greater force Meanwhile Chopper and Carrot finally discover Sanji through a mirror and learn where he is going but they are caught by Br l e The V in smoke family heads out to meet Big Mom at the Whole Cake Chateau and Sanji thinks about his crew as he reaches the point of no return
